title: PLEASE HELP
body:
every time i join a game minions are frozen jungle monsters aren't there and attack graphics keep on hitting u by minions. when minions are dead they stay there standing and attacking each other. I can't see any attack graphics by other players, my health bar stays full i can never know how much it really is, same goes to mana. in a word MY GAME IS GLITCHED AND FROZEN ALL THE TIME. 

i stop playing cause i CAN'T and in return i get reported and have 2 wait 10 mins to starta game. ABSOLUTE BS

replies.body:
It sounds like you're experiencing high amounts of packet buffering and/or packet loss. Since these issues are most often caused by network settings that cause your packets to encounter issues to the server, I recommend checking out our [connection guide](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) as a first step.

Let me know if you continue to see this issue.
